main event: Two white lights were observed at Glynco NAS, Georgia, during a military training drop on 11 March 1957.
interesting points: The observation involved military personnel,The lights were described as appearing to have been dropped during a training exercise,The number of objects observed was two,The lights faded out with no movement,No confirmed photos were included in the report.
witness description: military personnel including LT Cowell and J R Bryant
